alert.note: Alert for Lower Rio Grande Valley; San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; South Central Highlands; Southwest Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 3:47PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...STRONG AND ERRATIC THUNDERSTORM WINDS WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL SOCORRO COUNTY THROUGH 445 PM MDT... At 345 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from Lemitar to 14 miles northeast of Monticello. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Socorro, San Antonio, Lemitar, Bosque Del Apache Refuge, Escondida, Chamizal, Laborcita, and Luis Lopez. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 103 and 161. Highway 60 between Mile Markers 122 and 138. Highway 380 between Mile Markers 1 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Blowing dust associated with thunderstorm winds can reduce visibilities below one quarter mile at times.

area.areaDesc: Lower Rio Grande Valley; San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; South Central Highlands; Southwest Mountains
